name: server-prerender-app
description: A react-monk sample with prerendering express server.

scripts.build: npm run webpack:release && NODE_ENV=production npm run client:release && npm run babel:release
scripts.babel:dev: npm run babel:clean && concurrent --kill-others "npm run babel:build:watch" "npm run babel:serve:dev" "npm run client:proxy"
scripts.babel:release: npm run babel:clean && npm run babel:build
scripts.babel:serve:dev: mkdir -p lib && PORT=1337 HOT_RELOAD=1 nodemon --watch lib/server*.js --watch lib/server/routes/ lib/server-babel.js
scripts.client:release: npm run client:clean && npm run client:build
scripts.webpack:build: react-monk build src/server.js --out-dir dist/server --target node --webpack webpack.config.js
scripts.webpack:dev: npm run webpack:clean && concurrent --kill-others "npm run webpack:build:watch" "npm run webpack:serve:dev" "npm run client:proxy"
scripts.webpack:release: npm run webpack:clean && npm run webpack:build
scripts.webpack:serve:dev: mkdir -p dist/server && PORT=1337 nodemon --watch dist/server dist/server/server.js
